Package ulb.infof307.g9.view.mods

Class MultiChoiceCardView

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g9.abstracts.Observable<CardView.Listener>
ulb.infof307.g9.view.mods.CardView
ulb.infof307.g9.view.mods.MultiChoiceCardView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FreeMultiChoiceCardView, StudyMultiChoiceCardView
public abstract class MultiChoiceCardView extends CardView
An abstract class used to share the buttons for the twoo game mods using the multi choice cards (the free mod and the study mod)
